# Fathom MCP Server

> Connect Claude to your Fathom meetings, transcripts, and AI summaries.

## What is this?

Fathom MCP Server is an open source Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that connects Claude to Fathom, a meeting recording and transcription service. It allows Claude to access your meetings, transcripts, and AI-generated summaries.

## URL

https://www.fathom-mcp-server.com/mcp

## Available Tools

- list_meetings: List meetings with filters (date, team, recorder)
- search_meetings: Search meetings by title
- get_transcript: Get full transcript for a recording
- get_summary: Get AI-generated summary for a recording
- list_teams: List all accessible teams
- list_team_members: List members of a team

## How to Connect

1. Open Claude Desktop
2. Go to Settings > Connectors > Add Custom Connector
3. Paste: https://www.fathom-mcp-server.com/mcp
4. Authenticate with your Fathom account

## Source Code

https://github.com/agencyenterprise/fathom-mcp-server
